practiceExperiments.stimuli: What does it mean by having 'Prior Knowledge of Content'?
practiceExperiments.answer: It means that you as the user would have known the text to be copied. To simulate this, when 'Yes' is indicated, we will highlight the text to be copied, as well as bring the relevant window out in front of the user.
